text:
@realDonaldTrump Please...there are a lot of people that can't get tests.. they are just told to go home and quarantine for 14 days or even worse go back to work... such #bullshit 

#coronavirus #CoronavirusPandemic #covid19 #Quarantine #WashingtonState @GovInslee
